name: Rattled
summary: Raises the user's Speed when hit with a Dark, Ghost, or Bug move.
viability: Rattled isn't bad, but it isn't particularly good. It's true that Dark, Ghost, and Bug are all common attacking moves, but that's also only 3/16 of the types available. This means that you'll have to get really lucky with the move that hits your Pok√©mon.
